Tender Title
------------------
### Dental Sterilization Audits

**Reference Number:** PW-22-01011837
**Solicitation Number:** 21401-28-4206758
**Publication Date:** 2022-11-01

### Description

The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) has a requirement to conduct annual dental sterilization audits at 10 institutions within the Ontario Region. The Contractor will be responsible for conducting yearly audits, during the period from January 1, 2023 to December 31, 2027, with an option to renew for two additional one-year periods.

The objective of the audits is to assess compliance with dental sterilization in situ. The Contractor must provide a written report, within 30 days of the audit, highlighting compliance and deficiencies. Any concerns or practices that may potentially harm patients must be reported immediately to the Chief of Health Care and Regional Manager of Public Health.
